page.title: 09EVENTS:ASHLEWORTH
page.content: Ashleworth {Show}is held in September,in the Village Hall. Sometimes it is held on the {Village {Green.}There are many classes of entry,which include Produce from the garden,Floral Arrangements,Art and Craft,Photography,Wines and Cookery. There are classes for children such as Painting,Model-making,Miniature Gardens,Wild Flowers,Best Writing, and Cookery.There are also Cake Stalls, Sweet and Marmalade Stalls,Tombola, Children's Entertainment,a Raffle,and Teas for sale.Money raised is divided between the Church,Village Hall, Women's Institute, and the School.Most of the village is involved in the running of the Show.Every few years we have a {Festival}to raise money for the Church.Everyone helps and Ashleworth has become well-known for the success of these{events.
